caption: Agent Manifest Reference
description: Reference to an Agent Manifest, it includes name, version and a locator.
name: agent_manifest_ref

name.caption: Name
name.description: Name of the agent that identifies the agent in its manifest.

version.caption: Version
version.description: Version of the agent in its manifest. Should be formatted according to semantic versioning (https://semver.org)

url.caption: Manifest URL
url.description: URL of the manifest. Can be a network location or a file.
